revised_title: Spherical Harmonic Analysis and Applications to Ellipsoids and Ellipses
tldr: The author explores the use of spherical harmonic analysis in evaluating definite integrals and applies the method to the cases of ellipsoids and ellipses. They find the potential at an outside point due to an ellipse and discuss the exhaustion of potential energy between two solid ellipsoids. The author also mentions the expansion of the potential in other shapes like parallelopipeds and rectangular circuits.
